long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pricefy helps you monitor your competitors' prices on autopilot. With just a couple of clicks you will be able to track your competitor's product price on daily basis and take actions to be more competitive. 
Crete your reports and alerts to be always aware of your competitor's price strategy.
Auto-match your catalog with your competitor and find new competitors that you have never seen before thanks to our auto-discovery feature.
